moves.1. e4 c5 2. Bc4 d6 3. Qf3: Heh Everybody knows how to avoid this mate. And how someon could try it better is to develop pices
moves.3... e6 4. Nh3: Great place for knight. White plan is Ng5 and mate on f7
moves.4... Nc6 5. Bb5 Bd7 6. Bxc6 Bxc6 7. d3 N: My opponent moves the same piece few times gives mi chances to build attack.
moves.11... Bxb2 12. c3: Gives black rook for free. Better was 12 Ng7+ Ke7 13 0-0 Bxa1
moves.12... Qg5: To avoid Ng7+ better was 0-0 but game is easy win for black.
moves.13. Nd2 Bxa1 14. O-O Bxc3 15. Nc4 O-O-O: bishop sacrafice to get king to the center.
moves.21. Rxf2 Rxf2 22. Kxf2 Qd2+ 23. Kf3 Qxd3: if 25 Nxe4 Bxe4 26 Qxe4 Then Rf8 wins queen
